title: payment error
body: i bought $10 rp and i didnt get any riot points yet the payment was made so i bought $10 more yet that worked so i should have 2200 rp yet i only have 1100 help pls

replies.body:
Hey VortexGaming!

I know you posted this a while ago, but I wanted to make sure everything was squared away. Have you received the full RP balance of your purchases?

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=7AHbR3ut,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-04T06:58:24.283+0000)
>
> Hey VortexGaming!
> 
> I know you posted this a while ago, but I wanted to make sure everything was squared away. Have you received the full RP balance of your purchases?

I didnt get my rp until like a couple hours later so i basically spent $20 when i only wanted $10
